channel.title: Questions!
channel.description:
Hello, I have got a few questions can you please answer them :D
1. How can i make Npc exchange shop i coded that when you kill npc you will gain pvp shop but idk how to make a shop that you can change them
2. how can i make that when you buy something in pvp exchange shop that your points will lower
3. How can i make titles like uh double rampage and those kinda things
4.How can i add staff of light and vesta spear and Black Halloween Mask
4. How to make that you wont lose item on dead
That was all please somewane help i will Rep++ person that helps
Thanks!!

3. How can i make titles like uh double rampage and those kinda things

I mean like on pvp server from uhm Username is on double kill rampage things like that

2. how can i make that when you buy something in pvp exchange shop that your points will lower

I mean when you buy like dclaws is 400pkpoints and you have 1000 it will lower to 600 cause on my server when you buy your points wont lower -.-

and about npc shop
what you send is pvp shop not npc shop L…

item.title: Questions!

item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

1. How can i make Npc exchange shop i coded that when you kill npc you will gain pvp shop but idk how to make a shop that you can change them

Check this thread.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

2. how can i make that when you buy something in pvp exchange shop that your points will lower

Set the value for the items.

3. How can i make titles like uh double rampage and those kinda things

???

4.How can i add staff of light and vesta spear and Black Halloween Mask

Download the model. Get INT’s. And add them.

@Offtopic; this is my 1000th post !
